parameter.name: commandMethod
parameter.label: Command HTTP Method
parameter.description: HTTP Method to use when sending a command to the channel.

parameter.name: commandUrl
parameter.label: Command URL
parameter.description: URL to request to change the state of the channel. See the README for possible Command values. For POST requests, the request body will be by default of type text/plain and will simply be the command. For GET requests, the request body will be empty, but you can interpolate the command into the URL by using %s.
